field.name: spc_display_featured_job_badge

field.name: view_category_id
field.label: COM_JOBGROKLIST_VIEWS_POSTINGS_TMPL_RESPONSIVE_XML_CATEGORY_FILTER
field.query: SELECT '- Select Filter -' as view_category_id,'' as value UNION SELECT DISTINCT sc.category as view_category_id, sc.category as value FROM #__tst_jglist_categories c JOIN #__tst_jglist_static_category sc ON c.code=sc.id

field.name: view_category_desc_id
field.label: COM_JOBGROKLIST_VIEWS_POSTINGS_TMPL_RESPONSIVE_XML_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION_FILTER
field.query: SELECT '- Select Filter -' as view_category_desc_id,'' as value UNION SELECT DISTINCT c.description as view_category_desc_id, c.description as value FROM #__tst_jglist_categories c

field.name: view_jobtype_id
field.label: COM_JOBGROKLIST_VIEWS_POSTINGS_TMPL_RESPONSIVE_XML_JOB_TYPE_FILTER
field.query: SELECT '- Select Filter -' as view_jobtype_id, '' as value UNION SELECT DISTINCT sj.jobtype as view_jobtype_id, sj.jobtype as value FROM #__tst_jglist_jobtypes j LEFT JOIN #__tst_jglist_static_jobtype sj ON sj.id=j.code WHERE sj.jobtype IS NOT NULL;

field.label: COM_JOBGROKLIST_VIEWS_POSTINGS_TMPL_RESPONSIVE_XML_JOB_TYPE_DESCRIPTION_FILTER
field.query: SELECT '- Select Filter -' as view_jobtype_desc_id, '' as value UNION SELECT DISTINCT j.jobtype as view_jobtype_desc_id, j.jobtype as value FROM #__tst_jglist_jobtypes j WHERE j.jobtype IS NOT NULL AND j.jobtype NOT LIKE '';
